Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Ghost Town Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the main characters and the central conflict surrounding Ghost Town, including personal nostalgia and modern development plans.

sub_scenes.title: Nostalgia and Initial Conflict
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the protagonist's nostalgic feelings and a minor interpersonal conflict related to visiting Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction to Ghost Town and Woman's Nostalgia
Bar Conversation and Ghost Town Disagreement

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town Arrival and Modern Threat
sub_scenes.description: Nan journeys to Ghost Town and discovers a modern threat to its existence, setting up the central conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Solo Ride to Ghost Town
Modern Visitors and Airport Development Plan
Nan Overhears the Airport Plan and Reacts

Major_Arcs.title: Personal Turmoil and Romantic Entanglements
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc delves into Nan's personal reflections, past relationships, and conflicts arising from romantic and familial tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Past Reflections and Present Danger
sub_scenes.description: Nan's internal reflections on a past relationship are interrupted by a dangerous confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Reflection on Past Relationship with Cal

sub_scenes.title: Family Conflict and Emotional Breakdown
sub_scenes.description: Business discussions escalate into familial conflict, leading to Nan's emotional distress and isolation.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of Horses and Father's Disapproval

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Clarity and Business Obligations
sub_scenes.description: Nan receives conflicting advice, seeks clarification from Cal, and is reminded of her business obligations.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Determination and Pursuit of Cal
Business Deal with Cowboys and Urgency

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Ultimatum and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Nan issues an ultimatum to Cal, which leads to defiance and a period of loneliness followed by a belated confession.

sub_scenes.title: Confession Interrupted and Weather Crisis
sub_scenes.description: Nan's confession is interrupted by a severe weather warning, shifting the narrative to a community crisis.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Crisis and Hopeful Resolution
sub_scenes.description: The community grapples with the weather crisis, experiencing despair and a sudden hopeful intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Hope from the Sky: The Fodder Plane
Assessing the Situation and Lingering Concerns

Major_Arcs.title: Introduction and Conflict with Chane Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and the escalating conflict surrounding his character and actions in town.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Arrival and Town Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson arrives in town and makes a forceful impression, eliciting varied reactions from the townsfolk.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dangerous Casanova's Display of Force
Conflicting Views on Chane Benson's Heroism and Manners
Beyond Brute Force: Maturity and Civilization

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Obsession and Mother's Concern
sub_scenes.description: Concerns arise about Jeff's fascination with violence and guns, influenced by figures like Chane Benson, leading to family confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: Reminiscing about Brother Jeff's Childhood Hero Worship
Initiating a Talk about Jeff's Gun Handling
Mother's Disappointment and Desire for Decency
Comparison to Chane Benson and Criticism of Clyde Surrett
Defense of Chane Benson and Mocking Duel with Clyde Surrett

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Resolve and Looming Danger
sub_scenes.description: The mother resolves to guide Jeff away from Benson's influence, while danger looms with Benson's unsettling presence in town.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance and Shared Responsibility for Jeff's Upbringing
Affection and Hope for Future Happiness
Reflection on Blissful Ignorance and Looming Trouble
Advice from Mr. Benson to Sally
Chane Benson's Cold Demeanor and Silent Observation
Rejection of Brother's Influence and Disdain for Young Boys

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Benson and Clyde's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Surrett confronts Benson, leading to Clyde's intervention and a declaration of war against Benson's influence in Juniper.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Questioning of Benson's Intentions
Benson's Evasive Response and Assertion of Staying
Clyde's Intervention and Warning to Benson
Surrett's Further Inquiry and Clyde's Resolve to Stay
Clyde's Declaration of Action and Protection

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner with Benson and Escalating Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the dinner invitation to Chane Benson, escalating tensions, and culminating in physical violence.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner Invitation and Jeff's Transformation
sub_scenes.description: Sally proposes inviting Benson to dinner, influencing Jeff and setting a deceptive tone of courtesy.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Benson and Dinner Invitation
Narrative Reflection on Decency and Courtesy
Narrative Time Skip and Jeff's Shift in Viewpoint
Dinner Shooting Demonstration and Sally's Concern

sub_scenes.title: Dinner's Aftermath and Benson's Aggression
sub_scenes.description: The dinner concludes, leading to outdoor confrontations, accusations, and Benson's aggressive behavior towards Sally.

sub_scenes.title: Physical Violence and Jeff's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Emotional turmoil erupts into physical violence, followed by Jeff's determined escape and confrontation with Benson.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Provocation and Jeff's Anger
Sally's Urgency and the Escape Plan

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Victory and Future in Journalism
sub_scenes.description: Jeff confronts and defeats Benson, resolving the immediate threat and hinting at a future in journalism.

narrative_arcs.title: Headline Change and Relief at Return

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Troubles and Betsy's Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Betsy and ranch-related conflicts, intertwining business with romantic developments.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Conflict and New Hire
sub_scenes.description: Initial ranch conflicts are introduced, alongside the arrival of a new hire, Steve Daley.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Steve Daley and the Boss
Explanation of Steve's Hiring and Approval

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Logistics and Underlying Threats
sub_scenes.description: Logistical arrangements on the ranch are juxtaposed with growing concerns about external threats and range wars.

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Long Lady's Skill
sub_scenes.description: Events in town reveal Long Lady's capabilities and lead to a physical confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Firm Stance and Romantic Spark
sub_scenes.description: Betsy makes firm decisions regarding ranch management, while romantic feelings begin to develop between her and Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Love Confession and Profession Dilemma
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve confront the conflict of his profession as they confess their love and seek resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and the Dilemma of Profession

Major_Arcs.title: Devil's Pass and Violent Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features escalating ranch conflicts leading to a violent confrontation at Devil's Pass and its immediate aftermath.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Confrontation and Steve's Resolve
sub_scenes.description: Ranch tensions escalate into a direct confrontation, leading Steve to decide on a violent course of action.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Bridges and his Men
Steve's Decision to Arm Himself and Go to Devil's Pass
Betsy's Realization and Pursuit of Steve

sub_scenes.title: Devil's Pass Gunfight and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: The confrontation at Devil's Pass erupts into violence, with Betsy caught in the crossfire and the immediate emotional aftermath.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Devil's Pass and Initial Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Range War and Romantic Resolution (Carrie & Dave)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a different set of characters and a range war conflict, alongside a parallel romantic storyline.

sub_scenes.title: Range War Conflict Begins
sub_scenes.description: A new conflict emerges concerning range boundaries and cattle, setting the stage for a range war scenario.

narrative_arcs.title: Curley's Troubling News at the Ranch
Discussion Among Intruders and Threat of Gunplay

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Reconciliation and Proposal (Carrie & Dave)
sub_scenes.description: Dave and Carrie reconcile, leading to a marriage proposal amid the backdrop of range war tensions.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Fred and Brotherly Matters
Carrie's Introspective Thoughts on Love and Anticipation
Intrusion and Questioning by Fred Gordon
Carrie's Rebuttal and Declaration of Love
Desire for Reconciliation and Invitation for Relaxation
Carrie's Reflection on Love for Fred and His Qualities
Carrie's Confession and Dave's Marriage Proposal

sub_scenes.title: Contract Conflict and Emotional Resolution (Carrie & Dave)
sub_scenes.description: Conflict arises over the Carlton contract, leading to emotional outbursts and eventual reconciliation and understanding between Carrie and Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Deception and Plea of Love
Confrontation with Dave, Pete, and Fred

sub_scenes.title: Carrie and Fred's Reunion and Romantic Climax
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Fred's storyline reaches a romantic climax after overcoming misunderstandings and external pressures.

narrative_arcs.title: Chance Encounter and Emotional Inquiry in Town
Young Man's Confession and Carrie's Initial Reaction
Carrie's Flashback of Shame, Regret, and Happiness

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Rance's Showdown and Romantic Climax (Chris & Rance)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk's wounded arrival, the ensuing medical care, and culminates in the romantic resolution between Chris and Rance.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Wounded Arrival and Medical Emergency
sub_scenes.description: Dirk arrives wounded, prompting immediate medical attention and revealing the serious nature of his injury.

sub_scenes.title: Investigation and Ranch Confrontation (Rance & Chris)
sub_scenes.description: Investigation into Dirk's injury leads to a ranch confrontation involving Rance Cready and Chris Ransome.

narrative_arcs.title: Rance Cready's Arrival and Initial Encounter with Chris Ransome
Escalating Tension and Accusation at the Ranch

sub_scenes.title: Lawman's Duty and Shifting Emotions
sub_scenes.description: The lawman's duty to capture Dirk is explored, alongside his internal emotional conflict and shifting feelings.

narrative_arcs.title: Negotiation for Dirk's Custody and Care
Lawman's Internal Conflict and Shifting Perspective

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Confessions and Escape Plan
sub_scenes.description: Romantic confessions are exchanged, but Chris's plan to help Dirk escape introduces conflict and tests loyalties.

narrative_arcs.title: Expression of Desire and Lingering Doubt
Realization of Rejection and Internal Conflict
Confrontation about Intentions and Daybreak Departure

sub_scenes.title: The Chase and Violent Showdown
sub_scenes.description: A tense chase ensues, culminating in a violent shootout and its immediate consequences.

narrative_arcs.title: Justification for Deadly Force and Injury Assessment
Desperate Escape Plan and Moral Objection

sub_scenes.title: Escape to Mexico and Romantic Climax (Chris & Rance)
sub_scenes.description: Dirk and Chris escape, leading to a parting of ways and Chris's return to a wounded Rance, culminating in their romantic resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Parting Ways and Confession of Love
Confession of Sleepless Vigil and Lingering Danger
Father's Tactful Exit and Anticipation of Private Discussion
Clarification of Father's Integrity and Dirk's Involvement
Declaration of Gratitude and Undying Affection

Major_Arcs.title: Wedding Day and Unexpected Reunion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with the wedding day, unexpectedly disrupted by Dirk's arrival and resolved with the Marshal's explanation and blessing.

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day Preparations and Apprehension
sub_scenes.description: Preparations for the wedding are underway, but a sense of apprehension lingers, foreshadowing potential disruption.

narrative_arcs.title: Acclamation and Anecdotal Praise for Rance
